macrofocusrange: Approx. 0.4 in. (1 cm.) to infinity (wide-angle position) (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure with flexible program aperture-priority auto exposure bracketing manual shutter priority auto Exposure compensation (-2.0 to +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 16.40 oz. With battery and SD memory card
sensitivity: ISO 100-1600 ISO 3200, 6400 (available when using P, S, A or M mode) ISO Hi 1 (equivalent to ISO 12,800) (available when using High ISO monochrome in special effects mode)
exposurecompensation: -2 EV to +2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
imagestabilization: Lens shift VR (still pictures) Lens-shift and Electronic VR (movies)
continuousdrive: Up to 7 shots at approx. 7 frames per second
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 or 2 seconds duration
focallength: 4.3-258mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 24-1440mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
focusareapoint: Face priority Manual (spot) Manual (normal) Manual (wide) Subject tracking Target Finding AF
scenemodes: Backlighting Bird Watching Beach Black and White Copy Close Up Dusk/Dawn Easy Panorama Fireworks Show Food Landscape Moon Museum Night Landscape Night Portrait Party/Indoor Pet Portrait Portrait Scene Auto Selector Snow Sports Sunset
shutterspeed: 1/4000-1 sec. 1/4000-15 sec. (when ISO is set to 100 in M mode) When aperture is set to f/7.6 (wide-angle end)
normalfocusrange: [W]: Approx. 1 ft. 8 in. (50 cm.) to infinity [T]: Approx. 6 ft. 7 in. (2 m.) to infinity
viewfinder: Electronic viewfinder, 0.5 cm (0.2-in.) approx. 921k-dot equivalent LCD with the diopter adjustment function (-3 to +3 m-1)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
